definition[0]: someone from a different tribe or land, who people believe to be wild and not civilized
example[0]: The Roman Empire came under severe pressure from the barbarians across the Rhine.
definition[1]: someone who does not behave properly, and does not show proper respect for education, art etc
example[1]: The youths were described as uncivilised barbarians who savagely attacked innocent victims.
definition[2]: someone who behaves in a way that is cruel and uncivilized
